tr_quotes.quote: Merak mutluluğun en büyük sırlarından biridir.
tr_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişin sizi geride tutmasına izin vermeyin; güzel şeyler kaçırırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, her günü balayınızın ilk günü ve tatilinizin son günüymüş gibi yaşamaktan oluşur.
tr_quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şey eğlenceli değilse, onu doğru yapmıyorsundur.
tr_quotes.author: Bob Basso

tr_quotes.quote: Daha mutlu olmayı arzu ettiğimiz sürece artık mutlu olmayız.
tr_quotes.author: Walter Landon

tr_quotes.quote: Gülümsemen yüzünden, hayatı daha güzel yaparsın.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının mutlu olmasını istiyorsanız, şefkat gösterin. Mutlu olmak istiyorsanız, şefkat gösterin.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamak için iki yol vardır: hiçbir şeyin mucize olmadığını düşünerek yaşayabilirsin, ya da her şey bir mucizeymiş gibi yaşayabilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk sadece kendinizi diğer tüm oyalayan şeylerden kurtardığınızda bulunabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Saul Bellow

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi biraz rahat bırakırsanız biraz huzurunuz olacaktır, daha çok rahat bırakırsanız daha çok huzurunuz olacaktır
tr_quotes.author: Ajahn Chah

tr_quotes.quote: Günün her saatini saymayın, günün her saatini sayılır yapın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevinç, her şeyin aslında ne kadar güzel olduğunu anladığımızda başımıza gelen şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

tr_quotes.quote: Sevinç, öylece başımıza gelmez. Biz sevinci seçmeliyiz ve her gün seçmeye devam etmeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

tr_quotes.quote: Üzüntü asla yarının sıkıntısından bir şey çalmaz sadece bugünün neşesini tüketir.
tr_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı mutluluğun anahtarı değildir. Mutluluk başarının anahtarıdır. Yaptığınız şeyi severseniz, başarılı olursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

tr_quotes.quote: Her zaman iki seçim vardır. Gidilecek iki yol. Biri kolay. Ve tek ödülü kolay olmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Arkadaşların her zaman verdikleri mutluluğu kutlayın, her günü tatil yapın ve sadece yaşamayı kutlayın!
tr_quotes.author: Amanda Bradley

tr_quotes.quote: Tek bir mumdan binlerce mum yakılabilir ve mumun ömrü azalmayacaktır. Mutluluk paylaşıldığında asla azalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Bittiği için ağlama. Olduğu için gülümse.
tr_quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişin, sizi şimdiki zamandan alı koyabilecek hiçbir gücü yoktur. Sadece geçmiş ile ilgili sıkıntılarınız bunu yapabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Gülümsemen ile hayatı daha güzel yaparsın.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Zevk bir illüzyon ile desteklenebilir; ama mutluluk gerçeğe dayanır.
tr_quotes.author: Sébastien-Roch Nicolas De Chamfort

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüdüğümüz için oyun oynamayı bırakmadık; oyun oynamayı bıraktığımız için büyüdük.
tr_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen neşeniz gülümsemenizin kaynağıdır, ama bazen gülümsemeniz neşenizin kaynağı olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Refah, istediğinize sahip olmaktan daha çok sahip olduğunuzu istemeğe bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Geoffrey F. Abert

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk hazır bir şey değildir. Kendi hareketleriniz sonucu meydana gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm hayatınızı fırtınayı beklemekle geçirirseniz, hiçbir zaman günışığının tadını çıkaramazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Morris West

tr_quotes.quote: Kahkaha iki insan arasındaki en yakın mesafedir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Borge

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, düşündüğünüz, söylediğiniz ve yaptığınız uyum içinde olduğunda var olur.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Gülmek için çok meşgulseniz, gerçekten çok meşgulsünüzdür.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Bildiğim bir tek özgürlük vardır, o da aklın özgürlüğüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

tr_quotes.quote: Çoğu gülümseme başka bir gülümseme tarafından başlatılır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir gülümsemenin ardından, gün her zaman daha parlak görünür.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk bir nasıldır; ne değil. Bir yetenektir, nesne değil.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Mutlu olmak, her şeyin mükemmel olması demek değildir. Kusurların ötesine bakmaya karar vermişsiniz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini herkese göre ayarlayan kimse sonunda kendini tüketecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Raymond Hull

tr_quotes.quote: Sahip olduğumuz en önemli şey sağlıktır. Kanaatkârlık en önemli hazinedir. Güven en önemli dosttur.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatın sonunda, sorularımız çok basittir: Dolu dolu yaşadım mı? Güzel sevdim mi?
tr_quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

tr_quotes.quote: Akılsız insan mutluluğu uzakta arar; akıllı olan ayaklarının altında büyütür.
tr_quotes.author: James Openheim

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün size bir armağan gibi sunulan her şeyi kabul edin. Akşam olduğunda zihnen hepsini geri verin. Böylece özgürleşirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Daniel Levin

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişi bırakmak demek şu andaki rüyanızdan haz alabilirsiniz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk yoğunluk değil, denge, düzen, ritim ve uyum halidir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk basittir. Onu bulmak için yaptığımız her şey karışıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Karen Maezen Miller

tr_quotes.quote: Sevincimize en büyük engel kırgınlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Pema Chodron

tr_quotes.quote: Sevinçlerimizi ve acılarımızı onları yaşamadan çok daha önce seçeriz.
tr_quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

tr_quotes.quote: Bazıları mutluluk peşinde koşar, diğerleri onu yaratır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Harcamaktan zevk aldığınız zaman harcanmış değildir.
tr_quotes.author: John Lennon

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, işiniz ve sözleriniz size ve başkalarına yararlıysa gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Paylaşılmış sevinç iki kat sevinçtir; paylaşılmış acı yarım acıdır.
tr_quotes.author: İsveç Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk çoğa sahip olmaktan değil, aza bağlı olmaktan gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Cheng Yen

tr_quotes.quote: İyi bir gülüş ve uzun bir uyku doktorun kitabındaki en iyi tedavidir.
tr_quotes.author: İrlanda Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Kimsenin, mutluluğu üretmeden, onu tüketmeye hakkı yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatı çok ciddiye alma. Asla canlı kurtulamazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: Sonsuza kadar mutlu yaşamak ancak günbegün mümkündür.
tr_quotes.author: Margaret Bonnano

tr_quotes.quote: Sahip olduğunuz mutluluğun miktarı kalbinizde sahip olduğunuz özgürlüğün miktarına bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Yarının tüm çiçekleri bugünün tohumları içindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizle mutlu olmak için, kendinizi bazen kaybetmelisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Bob Genovesi

tr_quotes.quote: Kederleriniz yerine sevinçlerinizi sayın. Düşmanlarınız yerine dostlarınızı sayın.
tr_quotes.author: İrlanda Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Gülümsediğinde güzel olmayan bir yüz hiç görmedim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öfkeniz için cezalandırılmayacaksınız, öfkeniz tarafından cezalandırılacaksınız.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Gençliğin yaşı yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, çok az ve çok fazla arasında bulunan bir duraktır.
tr_quotes.author: Channing Pollock

tr_quotes.quote: İyimserliğinizi gerçekleştirin.
tr_quotes.author: Yazarı Bilinmiyor

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün güzel olmayabilir, fakat her gün güzel bir şeyler vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk seyahat edemez, sahip olunamaz, kazanılamaz, giyilemez ya da harcanamaz. Mutluluk, hayatın her dakikasını sevgi, zarafet ve şükran ile yaşatan ruhsal bir deneyimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

tr_quotes.quote: Parasızlığın eğlenmenizi engellemesine asla izin vermeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kişi yaşadığı değil, sevdiği yerdedir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Neşeli olmak sağlığın en iyi destekçisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Öfke, kızgınlık veya delirmekle geçireceğiniz her altmış saniye, asla geri getiremeyeceğiniz koca bir dakika mutluluktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kıskançlığı iyileştirmek, ne olduğunu görmektir: Kıskançlık aslında kendinden memnuniyetsizliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Joan Didion

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluğa yol yoktur, mutluluk yoldur.
tr_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk kendi içinde bir çeşit şükrandır.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

tr_quotes.quote: Başka şeyler bizi değiştirebilir, ama aile ile başlar ve biteriz.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk genellikle dış faktörlerden ziyade kendi durumunuzdan kaynaklanır.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Olaylar ve koşullar size zevk verebilir ama sevinç veremez – sevinç içimizden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Coşku bulaşıcıdır. Bir salgın başlatabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, bizi zorlayan kadere karşı kazanılan zaferlerin en büyüğüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk şansı olmasaydı, adaletin hali ne olurdu.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar mutlu olmaya karar vermişseniz o kadar mutlu olursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar, bütün arzularına sahip oldukları zaman mutlu olamazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Aesop

tr_quotes.quote: Bir noktaya kadar mutlu olabilmek için, o noktaya kadar acı çekmiş olmak gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk bizde olmadığı halde, başkalarına verebileceğimiz tek şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

tr_quotes.quote: Mutlu kelimesi, üzüntüyle dengelenmemişse anlamını yitirir.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Yung

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, sessiz bir gözün hasadıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer.

tr_quotes.quote: Her hareket mutluluk getirmez, ama her mutluluğun arkasında bir hareket vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Sevilmek mutluluk değildir. Her insan kendi kendini sever; ama mutluluk bir başkasını sevmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Birisi mutluluğuyla ya da erdemiyle övünüyor, böbürleniyorsa, onda bunun ikisi de yok demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Bir annenin mutluluğu bir işaret gibidir, geleceği aydınlatır, ancak geçmişe düşkün hatıralar kılığında da yansır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, bizi zorlayan kadere karşı kazanılan zaferlerin en büyüğüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk, kendinize birkaç damla bulaştırmadan başkalarına dökebileceğiniz bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: True happiness... is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: For me, fitness is not just about hitting the gym; it is also about an inner happiness and an overall well-being
en_quotes.author: Rakul Preet Singh

en_quotes.quote: The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances
en_quotes.author: J. Donald Walters

en_quotes.quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on
en_quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness
en_quotes.author: Izabella Scorupco

en_quotes.quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you
en_quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

en_quotes.quote: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair
en_quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: I know the joy of fishes in the river through my own joy, as I go walking along the same river
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage
en_quotes.author: Thucydides

en_quotes.quote: I think if you're a good person and spread happiness, good things will come to you!
en_quotes.author: Jessie James Decker

en_quotes.quote: The drive for happiness is vital; it's what keeps us in motion
en_quotes.author: Richard Gere

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that holds true happiness is that moment when you're in it. Nothing can be controlled
en_quotes.author: Eliza Doolittle

en_quotes.quote: Caring about others, running the risk of feeling, and leaving an impact on people, brings happiness
en_quotes.author: Harold Kushner

en_quotes.quote: The objective of cleaning is not just to clean, but to feel happiness living within that environment
en_quotes.author: Marie Kondo

en_quotes.quote: Nothing prevents happiness like the memory of happiness
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has their own way of expressing happiness
en_quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

en_quotes.quote: Being of service to others is what brings true happiness
en_quotes.author: Marie Osmond

en_quotes.quote: Independence is happiness
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates
en_quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

en_quotes.quote: It is not in the pursuit of happiness that we find fulfillment, it is in the happiness of pursuit
en_quotes.author: Denis Waitley

en_quotes.quote: Morality is not the doctrine of how we may make ourselves happy, but how we may make ourselves worthy of happiness
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: My mantra is: Let there be happiness in my soul, and let me share it with the world
en_quotes.author: Alexandra Stoddard

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is neither virtue nor pleasure nor this thing nor that but simply growth, We are happy when we are growing
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose
en_quotes.author: Tom Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is having a scratch for every itch
en_quotes.author: Ogden Nash

en_quotes.quote: When ambition ends, happiness begins
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: If I can bring happiness to people all around the world, then I will try my best to do so
en_quotes.author: Tom Holland

en_quotes.quote: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: No one has a right to consume happiness without producing it
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: One test of the correctness of educational procedure is the happiness of the child
en_quotes.author: Maria Montessori

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is hard to recall. Its just a glow
en_quotes.author: Frank McCourt

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a thing to be practiced, like the violin
en_quotes.author: John Lubbock

en_quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is variety, but the secret of variety, like the secret of all spices, is knowing when to use it
en_quotes.author: Daniel Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: Happy is the man who has broken the chains which hurt the mind, and has given up worrying once and for all
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them
en_quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who starts piercing the bubble of happiness, get 'em out of your life
en_quotes.author: Robert Kraft

en_quotes.quote: The Bluebird of Happiness long absent from his life, Ned is visited by the Chicken of Depression
en_quotes.author: Gary Larson

en_quotes.quote: The Constitution only gives people the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: The sound of laughter is like the vaulted dome of a temple of happiness
en_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

en_quotes.quote: Happiness held is the seed; Happiness shared is the flower
en_quotes.author: John Harrigan

en_quotes.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Just staying healthy, that is true wealth and true happiness
en_quotes.author: Jon Jones

en_quotes.quote: Happiness can only be found if you can free yourself of all other distractions
en_quotes.author: Saul Bellow

en_quotes.quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life
en_quotes.author: Linus Pauling

en_quotes.quote: It's part of life to have obstacles. It's about overcoming obstacles; that's the key to happiness
en_quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

en_quotes.quote: I refuse to accept other people's ideas of happiness for me. As if there's a 'one size fits all' standard for happiness
en_quotes.author: Kanye West

en_quotes.quote: I love walking down the street and seeing faces and drama and happiness and sadness and dirt and cleanliness
en_quotes.author: Ric Ocasek

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is making your dreams come true
en_quotes.author: Jourdan Dunn

en_quotes.quote: It's enough to indulge and to be selfish but true happiness is really when you start giving back
en_quotes.author: Adrian Grenier

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not a reward - it is a consequence. Suffering is not a punishment - it is a result
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: It is the ultimate luxury to combine passion and contribution. It's also a very clear path to happiness
en_quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

en_quotes.quote: You can be happy where you are
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: The U. S. Constitution doesn't guarantee happiness, only the pursuit of it. You have to catch up with it yourself
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new
en_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is like a kiss. You must share it to enjoy it
en_quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one's values
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: All you need for happiness is a good gun, a good horse, and a good wife
en_quotes.author: Daniel Boone

en_quotes.quote: I'm promoting positivity. I'm promoting happiness and loving yourself and having fun. But it's not a joke
en_quotes.author: Lil Yachty

en_quotes.quote: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice
en_quotes.author: Ben Jonson

en_quotes.quote: You can't get a cup of tea big enough or a book long enough to suit me
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is your own treasure because it lies within you
en_quotes.author: Prem Rawat

en_quotes.quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others
en_quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

en_quotes.quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Action may not bring happiness but there is no happiness without action
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: My happiness grows in direct proportion to my acceptance, and in inverse proportion to my expectations
en_quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

en_quotes.quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: It's not possible to experience constant euphoria, but if you're grateful, you can find happiness in everything
en_quotes.author: Pharrell Williams

en_quotes.quote: Genuine happiness comes from within, and often it comes in spontaneous feelings of joy
en_quotes.author: Andrew Weil

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the ideals of America, in liberty, justice, and the pursuit of happiness
en_quotes.author: Ilhan Omar

en_quotes.quote: Happiness does not lie in happiness, but in the achievement of it
en_quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

en_quotes.quote: Happiness consists in activity. It is running steam, not a stagnant pool
en_quotes.author: John Mason Good

en_quotes.quote: Never make friends with people who are above or below you in status. Such friendships will never give you any happiness
en_quotes.author: Chanakya

en_quotes.quote: Happiness comes from... some curious adjustment to life
en_quotes.author: Hugh Walpole

en_quotes.quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy
en_quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

en_quotes.quote: Isolation is the one sure way to human happiness
en_quotes.author: Glenn Gould

en_quotes.quote: Happiness can exist only in acceptance
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: The crown of life is neither happiness nor annihilation; it is understanding
en_quotes.author: Winifred Holtby

en_quotes.quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addison

en_quotes.quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives
en_quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the absence of the striving for happiness
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: Obviously, there will be different character traits in the dressing room, but I'm there to bring happiness and a smile
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lingard

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not that easy to achieve, but having a handsome husband, a beautiful baby, and a great job helps
en_quotes.author: Ellen Pompeo

en_quotes.quote: More compassionate mind, more sense of concern for other's well-being, is source of happiness
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of the greatest number is the foundation of morals and legislation
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

en_quotes.quote: My idea of absolute happiness is to be in bed on a rainy day, with my blankie, my cat, and my dog
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Happiness makes up in height for what it lacks in length
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: One mustn't ask apple trees for oranges, France for sun, women for love, life for happiness
en_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

en_quotes.quote: I'm trying to find a little joy and happiness, a lot of giggles - and maybe some pretty shoes
en_quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

en_quotes.quote: I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness
en_quotes.author: Maurice Sendak

en_quotes.quote: And one who is just of his own free will shall not lack for happiness; and he will never come to utter ruin
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is secured through virtue; it is a good attained by man's own will
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: When we were together, I loved you deeply and you gave me so much happiness I can never repay you
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: The first recipe for happiness is: avoid too lengthy meditation on the past
en_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

en_quotes.quote: Indeed, man wishes to be happy even when he so lives as to make happiness impossible
en_quotes.author: Saint Augustine

en_quotes.quote: The person who seeks all their applause from outside has their happiness in another's keeping
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: All happiness or unhappiness solely depends upon the quality of the object to which we are attached by love
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: The pursuit of happiness is in our Constitution. We're all entitled to have the best we can
en_quotes.author: Loretta Swit

en_quotes.quote: It is the true duty of every man to promote the happiness of his fellow creatures to the utmost of his power
en_quotes.author: William Wilberforce

en_quotes.quote: So long as we can lose any happiness, we possess some
en_quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

en_quotes.quote: The happiness of a man in this life does not consist in the absence but in the mastery of his passions
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: No matter how dull, or how mean, or how wise a man is, he feels that happiness is his indisputable right
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is like those palaces in fairy tales whose gates are guarded by dragons: we must fight in order to conquer it
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness
en_quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

en_quotes.quote: Our object in the construction of the state is the greatest happiness of the whole, and not that of any one class
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: It sounds strange to say, but someone's bad luck is sometimes the happiness of the other
en_quotes.author: Michy Batshuayi

en_quotes.quote: The pursuit of happiness is a most ridiculous phrase: if you pursue happiness you'll never find it
en_quotes.author: Carrie Snow

en_quotes.quote: Heroism is accessible. Happiness is more difficult
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is your dentist telling you it won't hurt and then having him catch his hand in the drill
en_quotes.author: Johnny Carson

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing that you can't overcome. So it's never too late for happiness
en_quotes.author: Pepa

en_quotes.quote: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a wine of the rarest vintage, and seems insipid to a vulgar taste
en_quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

en_quotes.quote: The secret to happiness is to face the fact that the world is horrible
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a ball after which we run wherever it rolls, and we push it with our feet when it stops
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness
en_quotes.author: Julia Roberts

en_quotes.quote: Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness, but it is greatness
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Happiness' is a pointless goal
en_quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is only real when shared
en_quotes.author: Christopher McCandless

en_quotes.quote: Your successes and happiness are forgiven you only if you generously consent to share them
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Our envy always lasts longer than the happiness of those we envy
en_quotes.author: Heraclitus

en_quotes.quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: I've learned to find happiness within myself
en_quotes.author: Karrueche Tran

en_quotes.quote: My aim in life isn't so much the pursuit of happiness as the happiness of pursuit
en_quotes.author: Charles Saatchi

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is always a coincidence
en_quotes.author: Jose Bergamin

en_quotes.quote: I love dancing, and I dance for my own happiness
en_quotes.author: Sai Pallavi

en_quotes.quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Happiness... consists in giving, and in serving others
en_quotes.author: Henry Drummond

en_quotes.quote: I wish I could throw off the thoughts which poison my happiness, but I take a kind of pleasure in indulging them
en_quotes.author: Frederic Chopin

en_quotes.quote: The only true happiness comes from squandering ourselves for a purpose
en_quotes.author: John Mason Brown

en_quotes.quote: A really great talent finds its happiness in execution
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Happiness does not consist in self-love
en_quotes.author: Joseph Butler

en_quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to find a congenial monotony
en_quotes.author: V. S. Pritchett

en_quotes.quote: Holiness, not happiness, is the chief end of man
en_quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

en_quotes.quote: Happiness exists only if you have a lot of people to share it with
en_quotes.author: Ranbir Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: It's the most beautiful job in the world to give happiness to people
en_quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

en_quotes.quote: I always associate blonde with sunshine and puppies and happiness, but I don't think sexiness
en_quotes.author: Alexis Ren

en_quotes.quote: Do not speak of your happiness to one less fortunate than yourself
en_quotes.author: Plutarch

en_quotes.quote: A sure way to lose happiness, I found, is to want it at the expense of everything else
en_quotes.author: Bette Davis

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is neither without us nor within us. It is in God, both without us and within us
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: I think a child may be the only thing that could give me true happiness
en_quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

en_quotes.quote: Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit
en_quotes.author: Hosea Ballou

en_quotes.quote: All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast
en_quotes.author: John Gunther

en_quotes.quote: I say there is not more happiness for me than the freedom of my Homeland
en_quotes.author: Islom Karimov

en_quotes.quote: We exaggerate misfortune and happiness alike. We are never as bad off or as happy as we say we are
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: I think happiness is love
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is something to do
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a virtue, not its reward
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather in spite of ourselves
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: To be perfectly happy it does not suffice to possess happiness, it is necessary to have deserved it
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness
en_quotes.author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

en_quotes.quote: God's children and their happiness are my reasons for being
en_quotes.author: Red Skelton

en_quotes.quote: What's the use of happiness? It can't buy you money
en_quotes.author: Henny Youngman

en_quotes.quote: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness
en_quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

en_quotes.quote: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness
en_quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

en_quotes.quote: What we call the secret of happiness is no more a secret than our willingness to choose life
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: Happiness isn't a fortune in a cookie. It's deeper, wider, funnier, and more transporting than that
en_quotes.author: Elvis Costello

en_quotes.quote: I don't want sadness or happiness to affect my life
en_quotes.author: Sandeep Singh

en_quotes.quote: The right to happiness is fundamental
en_quotes.author: Anna Pavlova

en_quotes.quote: Happiness lies in moments, and while you have it, you're not even aware; only afterwards do you know you were happy
en_quotes.author: Luise Rainer

en_quotes.quote: We possess only the happiness we are able to understand
en_quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

en_quotes.quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in strangers' gardens
en_quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

en_quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: There are people who can do all fine and heroic things but one - keep from telling their happiness to the unhappy
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Good clothing is a passport to happiness
en_quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

en_quotes.quote: I think the pursuit of happiness is the pursuit of reality because illusion never leaves us ultimately happy
en_quotes.author: Parker Palmer

en_quotes.quote: Happiness doesn't depend on how much you have to enjoy, but how much you enjoy what you have
en_quotes.author: Tom Wilson

en_quotes.quote: But O, how bitter a thing it is to look into happiness through another man's eyes
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: It is in the compelling zest of high adventure and of victory, and in creative action, that man finds his supreme joys
en_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

en_quotes.quote: But what is happiness except the simple harmony between a man and the life he leads?
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: The moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us
en_quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

en_quotes.quote: Happiness consists not in having much, but in being content with little
en_quotes.author: Marguerite Gardiner

en_quotes.quote: We find delight in the beauty and happiness of children that makes the heart too big for the body
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I get way too much happiness from good food
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Olsen

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony
en_quotes.author: Thomas Merton

en_quotes.quote: Life is to be fortified by many friendships. To love and to be loved is the greatest happiness of existence
en_quotes.author: Sydney Smith

en_quotes.quote: Low expectations is the key to happiness in life
en_quotes.author: Christopher Miller

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as the pursuit of happiness, but there is the discovery of joy
en_quotes.author: Joyce Grenfell

en_quotes.quote: Men can only be happy when they do not assume that the object of life is happiness
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: Never mind your happiness; do your duty
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: There is only one passion, the passion for happiness
en_quotes.author: Denis Diderot

en_quotes.quote: I have this really high priority on happiness and finding something to be happy about
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: The folly of endless consumerism sends us on a wild goose-chase for happiness through materialism
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the harvest of a quiet eye
en_quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

en_quotes.quote: Love is not a feeling of happiness. Love is a willingness to sacrifice
en_quotes.author: Michael Novak

en_quotes.quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: For me, the opposite of happiness isn't sadness but boredom
en_quotes.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

en_quotes.quote: There is no way to happiness - happiness is the way
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: Why does watching a dog be a dog fill one with happiness?
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

en_quotes.quote: Once you are satisfied with your goal, it is the real happiness
en_quotes.author: Saina Nehwal

en_quotes.quote: I am about to be married, and am of course in all the misery of a man in pursuit of happiness
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Doing nothing is happiness for children and misery for old men
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness
en_quotes.author: George Sand

en_quotes.quote: The world is full of people looking for spectacular happiness while they snub contentment
en_quotes.author: Doug Larson

en_quotes.quote: The greatest happiness is to transform one's feelings into action
en_quotes.author: Madame de Stael

en_quotes.quote: I never thought I'd be using this phrase, but the pursuit of happiness - that's my right
en_quotes.author: Jenifer Lewis

en_quotes.quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness
en_quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not being pained in body or troubled in mind
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Love is trembling happiness
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Happiness: a good bank account, a good cook, and a good digestion
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing which has yet been contrived by man, by which so much happiness is produced as by a good tavern
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Power means happiness; power means hard work and sacrifice
en_quotes.author: Beyonce Knowles

en_quotes.quote: A hug is like a boomerang - you get it back right away
en_quotes.author: Bil Keane

en_quotes.quote: The discovery of a new dish confers more happiness on humanity, than the discovery of a new star
en_quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

en_quotes.quote: Understanding your employee's perspective can go a long way towards increasing productivity and happiness
en_quotes.author: Kathryn Minshew

en_quotes.quote: I've gotten to a point, where I realize that happiness doesn't come from the outside
en_quotes.author: Ricky Williams

en_quotes.quote: Life is about making your own happiness - and living by your own rules
en_quotes.author: Aimee Mullins

en_quotes.quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not our circumstances
en_quotes.author: Martha Washington

en_quotes.quote: The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness
en_quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

en_quotes.quote: Choose your life's mate carefully. From this one decision will come 90 percent of all your happiness or misery
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Happiness isn't happiness unless there's a violin-playing goat
en_quotes.author: Julia Roberts

en_quotes.quote: It is not God's will merely that we should be happy, but that we should make ourselves happy
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: The wretched and miserable would rise into plenty of joy and happiness as soon as they climb the steps of my mosque
en_quotes.author: Sai Baba

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the cessation of suffering
en_quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

en_quotes.quote: How often we fail to realize our good fortune in living in a country where happiness is more than a lack of tragedy
en_quotes.author: Paul Sweeney

en_quotes.quote: Happiness lies so far from man, but he must begin by daring to will it
en_quotes.author: Ellen Key

en_quotes.quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a very small desk and a very big wastebasket
en_quotes.author: Robert Orben

en_quotes.quote: Sorrow happens, hardship happens, the hell with it, who never knew the price of happiness, will not be happy
en_quotes.author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

en_quotes.quote: Pleasure only starts once the worm has got into the fruit, to become delightful happiness must be tainted with poison
en_quotes.author: Georges Bataille

en_quotes.quote: In times of joy, all of us wished we possessed a tail we could wag
en_quotes.author: W. H. Auden

en_quotes.quote: If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: You cannot deprive somebody of life, liberty, pursuit of happiness, because that is a right - constitutional right
en_quotes.author: Gore Vidal

en_quotes.quote: A man doesn't know what happiness is until he's married. By then, it's too late
en_quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

en_quotes.quote: Life should be blissful, and blissful doesn't mean just a small happiness. It's huge. It is profound
en_quotes.author: David Lynch

en_quotes.quote: Life's greatest happiness is to be convinced we are loved
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Everyone chases after happiness, not noticing that happiness is right at their heels
en_quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

en_quotes.quote: Our vision and commitment is towards the country's progress, its place in the world and the happiness of its people
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: Happiness serves hardly any other purpose than to make unhappiness possible
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: How easy to be amiable in the midst of happiness and success
en_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

en_quotes.quote: The happiness of the creature consists in rejoicing in God, by which also God is magnified and exalted
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Edwards

en_quotes.quote: Martial arts is what pulled me through tough times, and it is one of the reasons for my happiness
en_quotes.author: Tiger Shroff

en_quotes.quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open
en_quotes.author: John Barrymore

en_quotes.quote: The happiest people seem to be those who have no particular cause for being happy except that they are so
en_quotes.author: William Inge

en_quotes.quote: The independence of all political and other bother is a happiness
en_quotes.author: Rutherford B. Hayes

en_quotes.quote: I am happy as happiness goes, for a woman who has so many memories and who lives the lonely life of an actress
en_quotes.author: Lillie Langtry

en_quotes.quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Anything you're good at contributes to happiness
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: All who joy would win must share it. Happiness was born a Twin
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Did perpetual happiness in the Garden of Eden maybe get so boring that eating the apple was justified?
en_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

en_quotes.quote: There is something curiously boring about somebody else's happiness
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Where fear is, happiness is not
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is mental harmony; unhappiness is mental inharmony
en_quotes.author: James Allen

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness
en_quotes.author: Don Marquis

en_quotes.quote: Be happy with what you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness
en_quotes.author: William E. Gladstone

en_quotes.quote: Happiness in the present is only shattered by comparison with the past
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a mystery, like religion, and should never be rationalised
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: When what we are is what we want to be, that's happiness
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a simple everyday miracle, like water, and we are not aware of it
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: Only one thing has to change for us to know happiness in our lives: where we focus our attention
en_quotes.author: Greg Anderson

en_quotes.quote: To describe happiness is to diminish it
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: Every happiness is a hostage to fortune
en_quotes.author: Arthur Helps

en_quotes.quote: I guess happiness is not a state you want to be in all the time
en_quotes.author: John Belushi

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is being on the beam with life - to feel the pull of life
en_quotes.author: Agnes Martin

en_quotes.quote: Real happiness comes from discovering a sense of importance in one's actions and in one's life
en_quotes.author: Mark Manson

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is working with Jack Lemmon
en_quotes.author: Billy Wilder

en_quotes.quote: Each person creates boundaries and walls around the self - this often keeps even happiness at bay
en_quotes.author: Govinda

en_quotes.quote: I think happiness is a goal all of us can agree on. Let's face it - we all would like to be happy
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: I often say that the opposite of depression is not happiness but vitality
en_quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

en_quotes.quote: I'm just dealing with what's happening, with what is. Joy, happiness, good, bad, all those terms are meaningless to me
en_quotes.author: Harry Dean Stanton

en_quotes.quote: For me, love is happiness and inspiration
en_quotes.author: Leona Lewis

en_quotes.quote: That which makes people dissatisfied with their condition, is the chimerical idea they form of the happiness of others
en_quotes.author: James Thomson

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a key to my success, and my family is a root of that
en_quotes.author: Robert Whittaker

en_quotes.quote: That action is best which procures the greatest happiness for the greatest numbers
en_quotes.author: Francis Hutcheson

en_quotes.quote: No one goes straight to happiness after a breakup
en_quotes.author: Estelle

en_quotes.quote: For me, the only sources of moral values are the pursuit of understanding and the pursuit of happiness
en_quotes.author: Matthew Stewart

en_quotes.quote: Five or six hundred heads cut off would have assured your repose, freedom and happiness
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Marat

en_quotes.quote: Future. That period of time in which our affairs prosper, our friends are true and our happiness is assured
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a hard master, particularly other people's happiness
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: So long as you don't feel life's paltry and a miserable business, the rest doesn't matter, happiness or unhappiness
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: Desire nothing, give up all desires and be happy
en_quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

en_quotes.quote: It is for others one must learn to do everything; for there lies the secret of happiness
en_quotes.author: Jules Verne

en_quotes.quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks
en_quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

en_quotes.quote: When you analyze happiness, it turns out that the way you spend your time is extremely important
en_quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

en_quotes.quote: I don't like rules of any kind. And I seek people who break rules with happiness - and not bringing pain to themselves
en_quotes.author: John Waters

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is an inside job
en_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

en_quotes.quote: There is no excellence without labor. One cannot dream oneself into either usefulness or happiness
en_quotes.author: Liberty Hyde Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable
en_quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

en_quotes.quote: Happiness isn't getting what you want, it's wanting what you got
en_quotes.author: Garth Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the longing for repetition
en_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

en_quotes.quote: Desire is individual. Happiness is common
en_quotes.author: Julian Casablancas

en_quotes.quote: The happiness I feel in having a family has brought me a real beauty
en_quotes.author: Kate Winslet

en_quotes.quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities
en_quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

en_quotes.quote: Happiness means nothing to me. I just want to have meaning and purpose
en_quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

en_quotes.quote: In our lives, we have good things and bad things, happiness and pain
en_quotes.author: Park Chan-wook

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not a possession to be prized, it is a quality of thought, a state of mind
en_quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

en_quotes.quote: I'd sing for any friend's happiness. I don't have to get drunk to do so
en_quotes.author: Yo Yo Honey Singh

en_quotes.quote: No one expects the doormat to stand upright, shake itself off, and amble down the street to seek its own happiness
en_quotes.author: Lynn Coady

en_quotes.quote: Happiness for me is the people whom you love, love you back
en_quotes.author: Jorge Ramos

en_quotes.quote: People will survive, and they will find happiness. Happiness only comes when you're not looking for it
en_quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

en_quotes.quote: I've heard that the true love of country music is alive and well. That gives me so much hope and so much happiness
en_quotes.author: Ashley McBryde

en_quotes.quote: Our nation was founded on the principals of life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness
en_quotes.author: Leonard Boswell

en_quotes.quote: There's a higher form of happiness in commitment. I'm counting on it
en_quotes.author: Claire Forlani

en_quotes.quote: I learned a long time ago that fame and money is not a ticket to happiness
en_quotes.author: M. Ward

en_quotes.quote: As long as you are being true to yourself, you will always find happiness
en_quotes.author: Amber Riley

en_quotes.quote: I'm a creature of the eighteenth century at heart: The Enlightenment and the search for happiness suit me
en_quotes.author: Brigitte Macron

en_quotes.quote: When a man has lost all happiness, he's not alive. Call him a breathing corpse
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Lovers who love truly do not write down their happiness
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a continuation of happenings which are not resisted
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is brief. It will not stay. God batters at its sails
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: Lucky that man whose children make his happiness in life and not his grief, the anguished disappointment of his hopes
en_quotes.author: Euripides

en_quotes.quote: The most exciting happiness is the happiness generated by forces beyond your control
en_quotes.author: Ogden Nash

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is the reward we get for living to the highest right we know
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: The happiness of this life depends less on what befalls you than the way in which you take it
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Nothing flatters a man as much as the happiness of his wife; he is always proud of himself as the source of it
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: To forget oneself is to be happy
en_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

en_quotes.quote: Know then this truth, enough for man to know virtue alone is happiness below
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: Always leave something to wish for; otherwise you will be miserable from your very happiness
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: Unquestionably, it is possible to do without happiness; it is done involuntarily by nineteen-twentieths of mankind
en_quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

en_quotes.quote: If you have not taken the time to define what happiness means to you, what have your spent your whole life pursuing?
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: So, my happiness doesn't come from money or fame. My happiness comes from seeing life without struggle
en_quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

en_quotes.quote: To have the sense of creative activity is the great happiness and the great proof of being alive
en_quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

en_quotes.quote: I really just want to spread my love and happiness toward other people
en_quotes.author: Jazz Jennings

en_quotes.quote: God dislikes evil, and no happiness can be built on hate. Love one another as brothers
en_quotes.author: Josephine Baker

en_quotes.quote: I think government has a major role to play in helping us with the pursuit of happiness
en_quotes.author: William Weld

en_quotes.quote: It's pretty hard to tell what does bring happiness; poverty and wealth have both failed
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is mostly a by-product of doing what makes us feel fulfilled
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Spock

en_quotes.quote: Perfect happiness is knowing that everyone I love is healthy, safe, and content
en_quotes.author: Joy Fielding

en_quotes.quote: Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability
en_quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

en_quotes.quote: Ever since happiness heard your name, it has been running through the streets trying to find you
en_quotes.author: Hafez

en_quotes.quote: Happiness comes of the capacity to feel deeply, to enjoy simply, to think freely, to risk life, to be needed
en_quotes.author: Storm Jameson

en_quotes.quote: What I think about is my happiness, together with my family. I want us to be happy
en_quotes.author: Neymar

en_quotes.quote: I am deeply grateful for the concern of all those who constantly prayed for my happiness
en_quotes.author: Princess Margaret

en_quotes.quote: If you hope for happiness in the world, hope for it from God, and not from the world
en_quotes.author: David Brainerd

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is composed of misfortunes avoided
en_quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

en_quotes.quote: The happiness which is lacking makes one think even the happiness one has unbearable
en_quotes.author: Joseph Roux

en_quotes.quote: I knew everything and received everything. But real happiness, is giving
en_quotes.author: Alain Delon

en_quotes.quote: I've learned very, very, very clearly that money does not equal happiness or security, either
en_quotes.author: Damien Rice

en_quotes.quote: There is no happiness in love, except at the end of an English novel
en_quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is only attained by the free will agreeing in its freedom to accord with the will of God
en_quotes.author: Sabine Baring-Gould

en_quotes.quote: Your destiny is my destiny. Your happiness is my happiness
en_quotes.author: Islom Karimov

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not a state to arrive at, but a manner of traveling
en_quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

en_quotes.quote: I find happiness in the tiniest things
en_quotes.author: Sai Pallavi

en_quotes.quote: There is no happiness for people at the expense of other people
en_quotes.author: Anwar Sadat

en_quotes.quote: As long as you understand that you find happiness through family, friends and love, then money is just a nice bonus
en_quotes.author: Ioan Gruffudd

en_quotes.quote: My children and their happiness have always been my greatest concern
en_quotes.author: Florence Henderson

en_quotes.quote: Even if happiness forgets you a little bit, never completely forget about it
en_quotes.author: Jacques Prevert

en_quotes.quote: I'm an inherently happy person. It comes from the inside, which means you can achieve happiness under any circumstance
en_quotes.author: Patrick Duffy

en_quotes.quote: It is not easy to find happiness in ourselves, and it is not possible to find it elsewhere
en_quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is often at its most intense when it is based on inequality
en_quotes.author: James Salter

en_quotes.quote: Happiness, to some, elation; Is, to others, mere stagnation
en_quotes.author: Amy Lowell

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is not a matter of events; it depends upon the tides of the mind
en_quotes.author: Alice Meynell

en_quotes.quote: Musical composition should bring happiness and joy to people and make them forget their troubles
en_quotes.author: Horace Silver

en_quotes.quote: Happiness: an agreeable sensation arising from contemplating the misery of another
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Eternal principles that govern happiness apply equally to all
en_quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is inward, and not outward; and so, it does not depend on what we have, but on what we are
en_quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: Unfortunately but absolutely fair to all, the one thing money can't buy is health - and happiness
en_quotes.author: Yolanda Hadid

en_quotes.quote: Happiness never lays its finger on its pulse
en_quotes.author: Adam Smith

en_quotes.quote: We are no longer happy so soon as we wish to be happier
en_quotes.author: Walter Savage Landor

en_quotes.quote: It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is
en_quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

en_quotes.quote: Only man clogs his happiness with care, destroying what is with thoughts of what may be
en_quotes.author: John Dryden

en_quotes.quote: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: One of the keys to happiness is a bad memory
en_quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

en_quotes.quote: A good way I know to find happiness, is to not bore a hole to fit the plug
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: To buy happiness is to sell soul
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: I am a kind of paranoid in reverse. I suspect people of plotting to make me happy
en_quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

en_quotes.quote: Happiness depends more on how life strikes you than on what happens
en_quotes.author: Andy Rooney

en_quotes.quote: It is only to the happy that tears are a luxury
en_quotes.author: Thomas Moore

en_quotes.quote: Happiness seems made to be shared
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: Happiness isn't something you experience; it's something you remember
en_quotes.author: Oscar Levant

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is a by-product. You cannot pursue it by itself
en_quotes.author: Sam Levenson

en_quotes.quote: There is happiness in duty, although it may not seem so
en_quotes.author: Jose Marti

en_quotes.quote: I'm a little weird that way. I don't really know how to express my happiness
en_quotes.author: Nargis Fakhri

en_quotes.quote: Joys divided are increased
en_quotes.author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is no laughing matter
en_quotes.author: Richard Whately

en_quotes.quote: It is great happiness to be praised of them who are most praiseworthy
en_quotes.author: Philip Sidney

en_quotes.quote: People let their own hang-ups become the obstacles between them and personal happiness
en_quotes.author: Lucinda Williams

en_quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring. And that is not happiness
en_quotes.author: F. H. Bradley

en_quotes.quote: When unhappy, one doubts everything; when happy, one doubts nothing
en_quotes.author: Joseph Roux

en_quotes.quote: Happiness will come from materialism, not from meaning
en_quotes.author: Andrei Platonov

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is itself a kind of gratitude
en_quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

en_quotes.quote: Happiness comes only when we push our brains and hearts to the farthest reaches of which we are capable
en_quotes.author: Leo Rosten

en_quotes.quote: There is no worse sorrow than remembering happiness in the day of sorrow
en_quotes.author: Alfred de Musset

en_quotes.quote: The action is best that secures the greatest happiness for the greatest number
en_quotes.author: William Dean Howells

en_quotes.quote: The secret to life is finding joy in ordinary things. I'm interested in happiness
en_quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

en_quotes.quote: If you have easy self-contentment, you might have a very, very cheap source of happiness
en_quotes.author: Leon Kass

en_quotes.quote: Life everlasting in a state of happiness is the greatest desire of all men
en_quotes.author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

en_quotes.quote: Most of us believe in trying to make other people happy only if they can be happy in ways which we approve
en_quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd
